lang_msg_pw_rule1: Password is at least 8 characters long.
lang_msg_pw_rule2: ID can not be used as a password.
lang_msg_pw_rule3:
If the password is less than 10 characters,
it must contains at least three of the following rules:
Upper/lower case letters, numbers, symbols.
lang_msg_pw_rule4:
If the password is more than 10 characters,
it must contains at least two of the following rules:
Upper/lower case letters, numbers, symbols.
lang_msg_pw_rule5: The same character can not be repeated than four, and More than four continous keyboard character can not be used.
lang_msg_pw_rule5_s1: The same character can not be repeated than three, and More than three continous keyboard character can not be used.
lang_msg_pw_rule6: If the password is 8 to 9 letters long, then it should be a combination of at least three types upper/lower case alphabets, numbers and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule7: If the password is 10 to 15 letters long, then it should be a combination of at least two types upper/lower case alphabets, numbers and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule7_s1: If the password is 10 to 16 letters long, then it should be a combination of at least two types upper/lower case alphabets, numbers and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule8: User name should be different from password.
lang_msg_pw_rule9: The following special characters are available for use. ~`!@#$%^*()_-+=|{}[].?/
lang_msg_pw_rule10: Don't use 4 or more characters consecutive together. (examples : 1234, abcd)
lang_msg_pw_rule10_s1: Don't use 3 or more characters consecutive together. (examples : 123, abc)
lang_msg_pw_rule11: Don't use 4 or more characters repeated. (examples : !!!!, 1111, aaaa)
lang_msg_pw_rule11_s1: Don't use 3 or more characters repeated. (examples : !!!, 111, aaa)
